subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The 222-kilometer stage up Monte Zoncolan was won by Ivan Basso, an Italian cyclist with the Liquigas team, in his biggest victory since he returned in 2008 from a suspension for doping.
snippet: The 222-kilometer stage up Monte Zoncolan was won by Ivan Basso, an Italian cyclist with the Liquigas team, in his biggest victory since he returned in 2008 from a suspension for doping.
